Hello! I'm Stephanie, a writer and web developer based in Los Angeles, California.

I currently work at a mobile technology incubator-accelerator on the Sunset Strip.

In my spare time, I wrangle text, symbols, and pictures.

Samuel R. Delany's Dhalgren is my favorite novel, followed closely by V. and Hard-Boiled Wonderland and the End of the World.
